title: Baby Carrier
description: geometric cross stitch embroidery in red, white, yellow on black; two long 1-3/4\" wide straps at waistband; two band of strung seeds at bottom; bottom seeds are attached to 2\" cross stitched squares over red fringe
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
